messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
Hi there! I am Leo, your Lufthansa Group travel navigator. Tell meif you could fly anywhere soon, what would feel exciting right now?
I want to go to Zurich next saturday. Stay for seven days. Only me.
That sounds wonderful! To confirm, you're planning to travel to Zurich next Saturday for a week. Could you please confirm the exact date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)?
25th of October, the nearest airport to my location.
It seems I need the IATA code for your departure airport to proceed. Could you please provide the IATA code for your nearest airport?
It seems there was a mistake with the departure date. Could you please provide a future departure date in the format YYYY-MM-DD?
Here are the flight options for your trip from Zagreb to Zurich on December 25th:
The shortest flight option is the direct flight OU460 from Zagreb to Zurich with a total duration of 1 hour 20 minutes and a price of 133.34. Would you like to proceed with this option?
